quotes.quote: Achieving life is not the equivalent of avoiding death.
You got to try and reach for the stars or try and achieve the unreachable.
A key to achieving success is to assemble a strong and stable management team.

There are countless ways ofÂ achievingÂ greatness, but any road toÂ achievingÂ one's maximum potential must be built on a bedrock of respect for the individual, a commitment to excellence, and a rejection of mediocrity.
ToÂ achieveÂ great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
What you are capable ofÂ achievingÂ is determined by your talent and ability. What you attempt to do is determined by your motivation. How well you do something is determined by your attitude.
The first step toward making the workerÂ achievingÂ is to make work productive.
If you want to reach a goal, you must 'see the reaching' in your own mind before you actually arrive at your goal.
There will always be something higher for me to reach for, and as long as there is, I'll keep reaching.
Nothing stops the man who desiresÂ toÂ achieve. Every obstacle is simply a courseÂ toÂ develop his achievement muscle. It's a strengthening of his powers of accomplishment.
If you wantÂ toÂ achieveÂ a high goal, you're goingÂ toÂ haveÂ toÂ take some chances.
ToÂ achieveÂ great things we must live as though we were never goingÂ toÂ die.
There are two ways of attaining an important end, force and perseverance; the silent power of the latter grows irresistible with time.
The discipline you learn and character you build from setting andÂ achievingÂ a goal can be more valuable than the achievement of the goal itself.
The thing that contributes to anyone's reaching the goal he wants is simple wanting that goal badly enough.
To exercise at or near capacity is the best way I know of reaching a true introspective state. If you do it right, it can open all kinds of inner doors.
It is easierÂ toÂ achieveÂ a desired result in short pieces.
What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
You cannot expectÂ toÂ achieveÂ new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
Direct your energy toward achieving a goal, and tackle the problems with an emphasis on edging closer to a successful result.
The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.
The first rule ofÂ achievingÂ goodness is this: think only about self-perfection.
Having an aim is the key to achieving your best.
Having an aim is the key toÂ achievingÂ your best.
The formula forÂ achievingÂ a successful relationship is simple: you should treat all disasters as if they were trivialities but never treat a triviality as if it were a disaster.
The three great essentials toÂ achieveÂ anything worth while are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
If you wantÂ toÂ achieveÂ excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
ToÂ achieve, you need thought. You haveÂ toÂ know what you are doing and that's real power.
If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.
If you want to achieve what you dream of achieving, whatever it may be, you're going to have to earn it.
There's nothing better than achieving your goals, whatever they might be.
You have all the reason in the worldÂ toÂ achieveÂ your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.
The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude fromÂ achievingÂ his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
For a manÂ toÂ achieveÂ all that is demanded of him he must regard himself as greater than he is.
To achieve the impossible, it is precisely the unthinkable that must be thought.
In order to achieve anything you must be brave enough to fail.
There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.
You can't achieve anything in life without a small amount of sacrifice
You should never worry too much about achieving your goals, because in the long run you might not find yourself too happy when you get there.
You must not let your negative emotions distract you from achieving your goals.
Achieving a goal is nothing. The getting there is everything.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
What enables us to achieve our greatness contains the seeds of our destruction.
Let us then be up and doing, with a heart for any fate; stillÂ achieving, still pursuing. Learn to labor and to wait.
If nothing else, the act of reaching a milestone often serves to reveal a superstar's true nature.
Achieving a goal requires endurance and sacrifices beyond limitations.
There's so much leftÂ toÂ achieve, there's so much moreÂ toÂ do, there's so much that has not been done.
Sometimes if you want to achieve something great, there will be curveballs. You just have to dodge them every once in a while.
As a rule, we find what we look for; we achieve what we get ready for.
